channel.title: Syringe on Innovation Home
channel.description: Recent content in Syringe on Innovation Home

item.title: Modeling a Syringe – A Lesson in Precision, Motion, and Real-World Design
item.description: In this project, we built a fully functional syringe model in Fusion 360. It helped us understand tolerances, movement, and how important small details are in medical devices. This was one of our favorite challenges — precise, practical, and deeply satisfying.
